title: Siren Lullaby - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Singers   Transported to Another World
author: Carine   흰냥이
description:
She always dreamed of becoming a singer. After a year of becoming a singer, She lost her voice due to laryngeal cancer.
And then a faint voice could be heard from her.

「......I can sing again.」

In a world filled with only the desire to sing again, she faces a new destiny.....!>
